title: Interest rates, oil execs and Trump tariffs: A busy day for US economy
shortDescription: The Federal Reserve forecast on rate cuts could tip its thinking on where the economy is headed in the coming months.

title: White House credits Trump for Starliner astronauts' return. Is it true?
shortDescription: 'PROMISE KEPT,' the White House posted on X shortly after the SpaceX Dragon capsule safely splashed down off the Florida coast.

title: Federal judge pauses Trump's ban on transgender troops
shortDescription: Transgender servicemembers and recruits are challenging Trump's ban as discrimination and say it should not be enforced as the courts hear their case.

title: Venezuelans call Trump's use of Alien Enemies Act 'staggering'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump invoked the Alien Enemies Act to hasten deportations of gang members, but Venezuelans said the law was intended for wartime.

title: Trump fires 2 Democratic FTC commissioners
shortDescription: Commissioners Alvaro Bedoya and Rebecca Kelly Slaughter said they had been "illegally" fired from the consumer protection agency.

title: Minnesota senator behind 'Trump derangement syndrome' bill arrested
shortDescription: A Minnesota state senator who co-authored a bill defining “Trump derangement syndrome” as a mental illness was arrested on charges of soliciting a minor for prostitution.

title: Roberts rebukes Trump's call to impeach judge
shortDescription: Chief Justice John Roberts rebuked President Trump's call to impeach a federal judge for his attempts to block deportations. Trump responded shortly after

title: Russia agrees to limited Ukraine ceasefire after Trump-Putin call
shortDescription: After Moscow and Kyiv agree to stop hitting each other's power plants and electric grids, negotiators will try to halt fighting on the Black Sea.

title: White House says it was consulted by Israel on latest Gaza attacks
shortDescription: The White House said Israel consulted with it before launching widespread airstrikes on Gaza that killed at least 400 on Tuesday.

title: Trump to shut down U.S. Agency for Global Media, Voice of America
shortDescription: Trump’s executive order disbands the U.S. Agency for Global Media, including Voice of America. The order also impacts global broadcasts.

title: Chuck Schumer defends shutdown vote amid calls for him to step aside
shortDescription: Chuck Schumer defended his Senate Democratic leadership role amid calls for his ouster over helping Trump and Republicans avoid a government shutdown.

title: Trump admin withholds details from judge about Venezuelan deportations
shortDescription: Trump invoked the 1798 Alien Enemies Act to hasten deportations of alleged members of Venezuela's crime gang Tren de Aragua, sparking a court fight.

title: Chief Justice John Roberts rebukes Trump over impeachment calls
shortDescription: In a rare public statement, John Roberts said "impeachment is not an appropriate response to disagreement concerning a judicial decision."

title: Trump pledges Kennedy Center overhaul, says it's in disrepair
shortDescription: After JD Vance was booed at a concert, Trump toured the Kennedy Center, saying it is in 'disrepair' and promising to overhaul the cultural center.

title: Musk, Soros help push record spending for Wisconsin court election
shortDescription: With money pouring in from billionaires such as Elon Musk and George Soros, spending in the Wisconsin Supreme Court race could top $100 million.

title: Trump administration to give countries new tariff 'number' on April 2: Updates
shortDescription: The Trump administration will give countries a proposed tariff rate based on their own rates, non-tariff trade barriers and other factors.
